Volunteer With Us

We are always looking out for volunteers, whether that be helping out on the streets or assisting with phone calls, emails, socials, or the tech side of things. Please don't hesitate to reach out to us by clicking the button below!

Volunteer

Meet the volunteers

Cee
Founder and Trustee

Cee is a visionary who works alongside our volunteers daily.
Toni
Trustee and Outreach Volunteer

Toni joined as a trustee and outreach volunteer during the height of the pandemic. Toni aspires to help many homeless people and their pets, providing much-needed help during outreach campaigns.
Daiod
Trustee and Outreach Volunteer

Daiod has experienced homelessness first-hand and has previously been supported by PINT. Today, he is an avid volunteer and a well-known figure in the boxing world.
Charlotte
Trustee and Ambassador

Charlotte is also keen to provide support for the homeless and their pets on the streets.
Derek
Outreach Supervisor

Derek believes everyone deserves dignity and respect. At PINT, we provide more than just food - we are good listeners and want to engage, and give people space to talk.
Marya
Administrator

Daisy
Marketing

Daisy is part of the marketing team at PINT. She is passionate about the fight to end homelessness and enjoys bringing a positive impact to the lives of the people she helps.
Oluwaseyi
Graphic Designer
